Name: My Empire
About the game: My Empire is a fun turn based 4x strategy game. Start a new civilization in the stone age, and build up your empire through the modern era. Along the way, you will go up against various AI controlled civilizations who are all vying for control of the world. Included in My Empire are 5 different difficulty modes and multiple map sizes. There is an expansive tech tree to unlock in this full featured turn based civilization strategy game. My Empire features the classic 4X gameplay of eXplore, eXpand, eXploit, and eXterminate. The game is won by defeating all enemy civilizations. Along the way you will conduct combat (ground and naval based) and diplomacy. Do you have what it takes to conquer the world? Download My Empire today and find out!
